title: MAG 038 - Lost and Found - Transcript Re-formatted-converted
text:
Yeah. I tried to kill it.... the shelf collapsed. 
SASHA 

The Magnus Archives – MAG038 – Lost and Found 
10 
 
I swear, cheap shelves are... Did you get it? 
JONATHAN SIMS 
Ah... I hope so. Thinks so. Nasty, bulbous looking thing. 
SASHA 
(Chuckles)Well, I won’t tell Martin. 
JONATHAN SIMS 
Oh, god. I don’t think I could stand another lecture on their importance to the 
ecosystem 
 [SHUFFLING NOISES] 
JONATHAN SIMS 
What? 
SASHA 
Look. 
JONATHAN SIMS 
Oh… uh… Got dented when the shelf collapsed, I guess. SASHA No, it, it goes 
right through. I, I thought this was an exterior wall? 
JONATHAN SIMS 
It should be. 
SASHA 
Hmm. I, I think it’s just plasterboard. 
[LOW NOISES OF FALLING DEBRIS] 

The Magnus Archives – MAG038 – Lost and Found 
11 
 
JONATHAN SIMS 
Do you see anything? 
[SOUNDs OF WET WRIGGLING] 
JONATHAN SIMS 
No, I don’t think so, it… 
[WORM SOUNDS] 
JONATHAN SIMS 
Sasha, run. Run… 
[CLICK] 
Recording Ends. 
[The Magnus Archives Theme - Outro]
